original_text: That is why we are not afraid to continue our work. Yes, our bodies are getting older and weaker. But our spirits are becoming stronger every day!
korean_text: 그러므로 우리가 낙심하지 아니하노니 우리의 겉사람은 낡아지나 우리의 속사람은 날로 새로워지도다

sentences.original_text: That is why we are not afraid
Yes, our bodies are getting older
sentences.korean_translation: 네, 우리의 몸은 점점 늙어가고 있습니다

sentences.original_text: But our spirits are becoming stronger
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 우리의 영은 더 강해지고 있습니다
